mapper.select: select * from org_func t where t.id=#{funcid}
select * from org_func t where t.code=#{code} and t.iseffect='y'

select func.* from org_Func func,org_FuncRoleRel rel,org_Role role where role.id=rel.roleid and func.id=rel.funcid and role.iseffect='y' and func.iseffect='y' and role.id=#{roleid} and (func.type=#{type} or func.type='3') order by func.pid, func.sort

select func.* from org_Func func,org_FuncRoleRel rel,org_Role role where role.id=rel.roleid and func.id=rel.funcid and role.iseffect='y' and func.iseffect='y' and role.id=#{roleid} and role.url=#{url} and (func.type='2' or func.type='3') order by func.pid, func.sort
